alert.note: Alert for Henderson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 02 at 4:00AM CDT until June 03 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Illinois... Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18 affecting Henderson and Des Moines Counties. For the Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 9.9 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached today. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this morning.
